address.docs:
**, int**: The I²C address of the driver. Defaults to `0x20`.

*See also: [PCA9554 I/O Expander](https://esphome.io/components/pca9554.html#configuration-variables)*

id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id to use for this `pca9554` component.

*See also: [PCA9554 I/O Expander](https://esphome.io/components/pca9554.html#configuration-variables)*

pin_count.docs:
**, int**: The number of bits implemented in the expander. Defaults to 8. This should be set to 16 when using a PCA9535 and 4 when using a PCA95367.

*See also: [PCA9554 I/O Expander](https://esphome.io/components/pca9554.html#configuration-variables)*
